tool_description: This web service calculates survey data using minimum curvature method
name: Oil Well Directional Drilling Survey Calculations
title: Oil Well Directional Drilling Survey Calculations
tool_name: Oil Well Directional Drilling Survey Calculations

api_list.name: Survey
api_list.description: it receives a survey objects list and responds a similar list but with the calculated values added
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oil-well-directional-drilling-survey-calculations.p.rapidapi.com/survey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oil-well-directional-drilling-survey-calculations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
